root: ^You've running around for quite some time now without finding it.
^Lima: Sigh... This is u-useless, I'm not helping at a-all. Are we lost? I'm so useless...
^You turn around to see that weird fireflie again.

b: ^You stay quietly at the same spot.
cont: ^The fireflies seems to be happy to see you, it gets close to you and it's light shines brighter.
^The dazzling light blinds you for a second.
^Right in front of you, floating in the same spot as the fireflies was just a second ago, it's a ghost. A real one!
^Tibo: That's not the point! Hey, pal, what's your name?
^???: I am Terry, nice to meet you, Tibo.
^Lima: We f-found him! Mars is going to be s-so relieved!
^Tibo: That kid has been looking for you all over the forest, WHERE THE HECK WHERE YOU?!
^Terry: I believe you all deserve an explanation.
^Terry: I have been in this forest for a long time. Watching your daily lifes and your troubles.
^Terry: I felt really troubled. I wanted to help, but couldn't do anything my self.
^Terry: I started looking for someone that could do that, a kind hearted soul that will lead you to a better future...
^Terry: But my time was running out.
^Terry: Soul, you were my last hope and you have accomplished a lot tonight.
^Terry: I never thought Lima could be more confident,
^Terry: that Leo would help someone altruistically,
^Terry: that Mars would do her best to protect someone she just met...
^Terry: And I... I feel that I can believe in the future once again, even if I am not part of it.
^The sun was going to rise soon and Terry noticed that just on time.
^Terry: But there is no more time to spare! Quick, lets go meet Big Shadow!
